hero.bio: Motivated Software Developer committed to continuous learning and active participation in development projects for both Backend and Frontend. Capable of creating scalable, user-centered solutions.

navidad.title: Armando la Navidad
navidad.description: Developed an interactive game using exclusively CSS (without frameworks or JavaScript) to handle layouts, typography and colors. Created complex animations and smooth transitions, as well as real randomization logic and CSS transformations, ensuring responsive design.

news.title: News Portal
news.description: Built a modern, responsive web application that consumes the News API to display real-time information. Optimized performance through RTK Query for efficient cache management and global application state, and designed an advanced user interface with synchronized light/dark mode.

ui_clone.title: UI Web Cloning
ui_clone.description: Applied fundamental UX/UI principles to faithfully replicate an existing web interface, focusing on the precision of spacing, typography and visual hierarchy.

kanban.title: My Full Stack App - Kanban
kanban.description: Developed a Kanban-style Full Stack web application with secure authentication, complete CRUD management and Markdown content editing. Implemented advanced interactive features such as drag and drop and real-time chat with WebSockets. REST API with NestJS and TypeORM, Docker and deployment on AWS EC2.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.description: Built my personal portfolio using React, Tailwind CSS implementing i18next, react-i18next and i18next-browser-languagedetector.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I am a developer passionate about technology and innovation. Since an early age I have been fascinated by the world of software development.
about.paragraph2: I love learning new technologies and facing complex challenges. In my free time, I contribute to open source projects to learn from the knowledge with the community.
about.paragraph3: My goal is to create applications that not only work well, but also provide an exceptional user experience.

footer.madeWith: Made with React + Vite + Tailwind CSS
